messages.title: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY'S PRIORITIES
messages.content: At the end of the selection, we'll either get a Conservative majority - or a hung parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I helped make sure that Salisbury was the first full fibre broadband city in the UK. Now we need to focus on improvements to the A36 and enhance the appeal of the city centre and The Maltings.
The natural environment is our greatest treasure. I am committed to greening the city centre in Salisbury and protecting the rural character of villages across South Wiltshire.

I want to see us harness the science and technology hubs at Porton and Boscombe Down to create high-value jobs for local people. I am passionate about creating a strong local economy with fantastic employment opportunities.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority
